definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: family connexion of individ. Ge 24:38 (+ [[בֵּית־אָבִי]]), v:Ge 24:40 ( + id.), v:Ge 24:41 (all J ; = [[מוֹלַדְתִּי]] v:Ge 24:4), 2Sa 14:7, united in sacrifice 1Sa 20:6, 1Sa 20:29, in passover Ex 12:21 (JE; cf. Benz:Ency.Bib. PASSOVER, §§ 9, 12); cf. Le 20:5 (H), Le 25:10, Le 25:41 (P), v:Le 25:49 (P; defined as [[מִשְּׁאֵר בְּשָׂרוֹ]]), non-Heb. v:Le 25:47 (H), v:Le 25:45(P), Ju Jdg 1:25; [[מִשְׁפְּחוֹתֶיהָ]] Jos 6:23 (E or R) is unintelligible, probably del. (cf. Steuern Holz; [[בֵּית]] [[אָבִיהָ]] in v:Jos 6:25 [J]), cf. Nu 27:4, Nu 27:11(P) ; [[בֵּית אֲבִי אִמּוֹ]] ´[[מ]]: Ju Jdg 9:1 clan of his mother’s father-house; incl. individuals, and included by [[שֵׁבֶט]] 1Sa 9:21, 1Sa 9:21, 1Sa 10:21; with specif. name, in series [[גֶבֶר]], [[בַּיִת]], ´[[מ]]:, [[שֵׁבֶט]] Jos 7:14, Jos 7:14, Jos 7:17 b, c (all J; v:Jos 7:17 a read pl. Di Benn, or [[שֵׁבֶט]] GFM:Ju Jdg 13:2; Steuern allows either); cf. De 29:17, Ju Jdg 21:24, ´[[אָבִי בְּיִשׂ]] :´[[מ]]: 1Sa 1:18 (+ [[חַיַּי]], v. II [[[חַי]]]; [[בֵּית־שָׁאוּל]] ´[[מִמּ]]…[[אִישׁ]]:: 2Sa 16:5; with name also Ru 2:1, Ru 2:3 and (non-Isr.) Job 32:2.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in loose, popular sense= tribe, Ju Jdg 13:2, Jdg 17:7, Jdg 18:19, cf. v:Jdg 18:2 (‖[[שֵׁבֶט ]] v:Jdg 18:1), v:Jdg 18:11 (yet in these two rd. poss. pl., v. GFM).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: techn. divisions of people of Isr. Nu 11:10 (J) Je 2:4, Je 31:1; cf. Je 3:14; Nu 1:2, Nu 1:18, Nu 2:34, Nu 33:54 (all P), so (post-ex.) Ne 4:7: Es 9:28 ([[מְדִינׇה]], ´[[מ]]:, [[דּוֹר]]).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: usu. (P) techn. divisions of tribes of Israel, Ex 6:14, Ex 6:15, Ex 6:19, Ex 6:25, Nu 3:15 + 112 t. Nu (93 t. Nu 26, incl. v:Nu 26:43 where [[הַשּׁוּחָמִי]] appar. = Dan), 34 t. Jos 13-21; also 1Ch 6:4, 1Ch 6:45, 1Ch 7:5, Zec 12:13; division of Gershom, etc. (in Levi) Nu 3:18, Nu 3:19, Nu 3:20 + 41 t. Ex Nu Jos Ch; subdivisions of these divisions (in Levi) Nu 3:21, Nu 3:21 + 6 t. Nu 3 + Nu 4:18; cf. (in other tribes) 1Ch 2:53, 1Ch 4:2, 1Ch 4:8, 1Ch 4:21, 1Ch 4:27, 1Ch 4:38, 1Ch 5:7; also Zec 12:12 b, Zec 12:12 c, Zec 12:13 b, Zec 12:14 a, and (distrib.) v:Zec 12:12 a, v:Zec 12:14 b, pleonast. [[מַטֵּה אֲבִיהֶם]] ´[[מ]]: Nu 36:6 cf. v:Nu 36:8, and (´[[א]] :´[[מַטֵּה מ]]:) v:Nu 36:12.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: late, div. of other peoples 1Ch 16:28 = Ps 96:7, Ps 22:28; in Edom Ge 36:40 (P).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: in wider sense=people, nation; [[כּׂל מִשְׁפְּחׂת תָאֲדָמָה]] Am 3:2, Ge 12:3, Ge 28:14 (both J), cf. Je 10:25, Ez Eze 20:32, Na 3:4 (all [[גּוֹיִם]]), Zec 14:17, Je 1:15, Je 25:9; as one’s posterity Ge 10:30, Ge 10:31, Ge 10:32 (all P), so prob. v:Ge 10:5 (P; Di Dr); = all Isr. Am 3:1, Judah Mic 2:3, Je 8:3 ([[הָרָעָה הַזּאׁת]] ´[[הַמּ]]:), Isr. + Judah, ´[[שְׁתֵּי הַמּ]]: Je 33:24; [[מִשְׁפַּחַת מִחְרַיִם]] Zec 14:18; cf. Ps 107:41. †
= guild 1Ch 2:55 (of scribes; orig. hereditary in families). †
